main event: An unidentified flying object was sighted over Decatur, Illinois in May 1960, described as disc-shaped and moving at high speeds.
interesting points: The object was estimated to be 40 to 50 feet in diameter and was observed moving at speeds of around 3000 miles per hour,The sighting lasted approximately 15 minutes with the object making a sharp turn at high speed,The area had been experiencing continuous sightings for over 6 years,One witness reported that the object had a peculiar glow and made no sound during its movement,The incident involved multiple sightings, including reports by local law enforcement and civilians.
witness description: Civilian witnesses including a chemist, a retired Air Force officer, and local residents who reported ongoing sightings.
